From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

"Fool, I do compare to the pit!" Slayer growls

Lunarpine laughed. that was the first thing the two wolves agreed on since
Slayer was Striker. Lunarpine crossed his claws again blocking the lasers
Slayer fired at him.
"I agree, you are like the Pit, you keep going on without end. but enough
about your talking I'm still waiting for you to atack. Or is this the best
you got?"

Lunarpine soon ate his words as a missle struck his crossed claws knocking
him off balance. A second missle struck him in the shoulder causing a gaping
rip in his frame. The bot stumbled to the ground holding his wound.
Lunarpine knew that beast mode would heal him but would leave him vulnerable
for another attack. he had to stay in bot mode to fight. Slayer was
hesitating, Lunarpine didn't know for sure why but decided to act instead of
dwell on it.

The wolfbot curled up trying to protect the wound. "Come on toughbot live up
to your name. Prove how tough you are. FINISH ME or I'll come looking for
you, I have your scent and I WILL FIND YOU!!!"


----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 30, 2000 1:24 PM
Subject: Re: Yanosh don't leave me hangin


> ::Slayer::
>
> And antique? Slayer frowns, realizing he had no idea of when or how he
> had been made. But that didn't matter, he told himself, right now it
> was just the death of this bot that mattered.
>
> "Fool, I do compare to the pit!" Slayer growls, his shoulder blasters
> emerging out of two openings in the shoulders of his suit, firing
> laser blasts at him along with a missile from his missile launchers,
> running out of ammo for them.
>
> "When I kill you, I will take your body to Master Prebon. Perhaps he
> will place the spark of a *real* warrior in it!"
>
>
>

> compares to

> of
